title: Kit sponsorship revenue of German Bundesliga clubs 2019/20
yAxis: Kit sponsorship revenue in million euros
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Kit sponsorship revenue in million euros, containing a total of 18 data points.
Overall Kit sponsorship revenue in million euros has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year FC_Augsburg_(WWK) and FC_Bayern_Munich_(Telekom).
The highest Kit sponsorship revenue in million euros, of value 35.0 was reached at Year FC_Bayern_Munich_(Telekom)
Minimum Kit sponsorship revenue in million euros about 2.0 was reached at Year SC_Paderborn_(Sunmaker)

max_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Kit sponsorship revenue in million euros. In total the number of data points it has is 18.
Overall Kit sponsorship revenue in million euros has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year FC_Augsburg_(WWK) and FC_Bayern_Munich_(Telekom).

The line significantly increased by 14.0 from Year Bayer_04_Leverkusen_(Barmenia) to Borussia_Dortmund_(Evonik),increased by 30.5 from Year FC_Augsburg_(WWK) to FC_Bayern_Munich_(Telekom),remained stable by 20.0 from Year FC_Schalke_04_(Gazprom) to FSV_Mainz_05_(Kömmerling),increased by 4.5 from Year Fortuna_Düsseldorf_(Henkel) to Hertha_BSC_Berlin_(Tedi),increased by 5.3 from Year SC_Paderborn_(Sunmaker) to SV_Werder_Bremen_(Wiesenhof), and lastly, increased by 17.5 from Year Union_Berlin_(Aroundtown) to VfL_Wolfsburg_(Volkswagen).
